description:
An incredibly lightweight and breathable tech tee for high-exertion days, the ZoneKnit™ Short Sleeve Tee features engineered body-mapping technology to provide optimal ventilation and temperature control. The ZoneKnit features a combination of icebreaker’s moisture managing jersey Cool-Lite™ fabric with panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh on the back and sleeves that help dispense excess heat. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction when carrying a pack.

Soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from responsible eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a fabric that helps to regulate your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker ZoneKnit SS Tee - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool, Exclusive Of Decoration
